transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello. Hello. Haan ji.

Executive: Haan ji madam namaskar. Gaurav baat kar raha tha madam India mart se.

Customer: Namaste bataiye.

Executive: Madam yahan pe mujhe feedback receive hua tha aapki company se ki buyleads relevant nahi aa rahi uske regarding to maine abhi primary number pe bhi connect kiya to unhone bola ki aap jis number se aaya hua hai us pe kijiye to secondary number aapka hi tha.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: To main jaan sakta madam kya issue leads vagera mein aa raha hai jaise aapne yahan pe dala hua hai ek bhi leads relevant nahi aa rahi hai.

Customer: Haan wahi issue hai jo wahan pe clearly mentioned hai.

Executive: To madam main to dekh raha tha aap pehle bhi leads consume kar rahe the aap agar main last month ki baat karu to last month bhi aapne matlab agar 26 october se leke november tak aapne 18 buyleads consume kiye madam to leads to aa rahi thi pehle.

Customer: But wo bhi relevant nahi thi aap to ye tha chalo relevant nahi aa rahi tab tak yahi sahi koi aur option bhi to nahi hai na aapke coordinator se kitni baar baat hui hai kitni baar video calls hui hai system unko diya hai tab bhi nahi aa rahi hai.

Executive: Bilkul agar abhi aap open karenge ek baar system dekhiye main dekh raha hu main maharashtra ke leads padi hui hai madam jaise aapne 500 ki uski boli thi ki capacity ke upar mein jaise dekh raha hu previous to aro plant ki.

Customer: 5000 ki hai ji.

Customer: Ji aur ye bhi kafi baar bata chuke hain even products mein bhi yahi update hai.

Executive: Dekhiye us kya reason batau aapko bhi pata hai ki aapki high sold category hai theek hai madam us is vajah se iski.

Customer: I want to say something that we don't want any kind of issues that we are facing this we are facing we are just want relevant leads so can you please process for the same.

Customer: Because it's been long time we are on the same place and which is not worth it i think you can understand.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are not relevant.

- Coordinator unable to resolve the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive stated customer consumed 18 buyleads last month.

- Executive mentioned Maharashtra leads are available.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, relevant leads, coordinator, system
